00020 NewBusPage::NewBusPage(LibraryInterface* libHandler, QWidget *parentDlg):
00021 PropertyPageView(),
00022 libInterface_(libHandler), 
00023 vlnvEditor_(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, libHandler, parentDlg, this, true),
00024 directoryEdit_(this) {
00025 
00026         Q_ASSERT_X(libHandler, "NewBusPage constructor",
00027                 "Null LibraryInterface pointer given as parameter");
00028 
00029         connect(&vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00030                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031     connect(&vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SLOT(updateDirectory()));
00032 
00033         // Create the title and description labels labels.
00034         QLabel* titleLabel = new QLabel(tr("New Bus"), this);
00035 
00036         QFont font = titleLabel->font();
00037         font.setPointSize(12);
00038         font.setBold(true);
00039         titleLabel->setFont(font);
00040 
00041         QLabel* descLabel = new QLabel(tr("Creates a new bus"), this);
00042 
00043         // Create the directory line edit and label.
00044         QLabel *directoryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Directory:"), this);
00045 
00046         QSettings settings;
00047         QString defaultDir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00048         directoryEdit_.setText(defaultDir);
00049         connect(&directoryEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(QString const&)),
00050                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00051 
00052         QPushButton* pathButton = new QPushButton("Browse...", this);
00053         connect(pathButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(selectDirectory()));
00054         QHBoxLayout *pathLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00055         pathLayout->addWidget(directoryLabel);
00056         pathLayout->addWidget(&directoryEdit_, 1);
00057         pathLayout->addWidget(pathButton);
00058 
00059         // Setup the layout.
00060         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00061         layout->addWidget(titleLabel);
00062         layout->addWidget(descLabel);
00063         layout->addSpacing(12);
00064         layout->addWidget(&vlnvEditor_);
00065         layout->addSpacing(12);
00066         layout->addLayout(pathLayout);
00067         layout->addStretch(1);
00068 }

00071 }

00073 bool NewBusPage::prevalidate() const {
00074         return (vlnvEditor_.isValid() && !directoryEdit_.text().isEmpty());
00075 }
00076 
00077 bool NewBusPage::validate() {
00078         Q_ASSERT(prevalidate());
00079 
00080     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_.getVLNV();
00081 
00082     /*VLNV absVLNV(VLNV::DESIGN, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00083                  vlnv.getName().remove(".busDef", Qt::CaseInsensitive) + ".absDef", vlnv.getVersion());*/
00084 
00085     // Check if any of the VLNVs already exists.
00086     if (libInterface_->contains(vlnv))
00087     {
00088         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00089             tr("The bus cannot be created because the VLNV %1 already exists in the library.").arg(vlnv.toString()),
00090             QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00091         msgBox.exec();
00092         return false;
00093     }
00094 
00095     /*if (libInterface_->contains(absVLNV))
00096     {
00097         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00098             tr("The bus cannot be created because the VLNV %1 already exists in the library.").arg(absVLNV.toString()),
00099             QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00100         msgBox.exec();
00101         return false;
00102     }*/
00103 
00104         return true;
00105 }
00106 
00107 void NewBusPage::apply() {
00108          emit createBus(vlnvEditor_.getVLNV(), directoryEdit_.text());
00109 }
00110 
00111 bool NewBusPage::onPageChange() {
00112         // Discard the VLNV.
00113         vlnvEditor_.setVLNV(VLNV());
00114         return true;
00115 }
00116 
00117 void NewBusPage::selectDirectory() {
00118         QString dir = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Select Directory"),
00119                 directoryEdit_.text());
00120 
00121         if (!dir.isEmpty())
00122         {
00123                 directoryEdit_.setText(dir);
00124         }
00125 }
00126 
00127 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 // Function: updateDirectory()
00129 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00130 void NewBusPage::updateDirectory()
00131 {
00132     QSettings settings;
00133     QString dir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00134 
00135     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_.getVLNV();
00136 
00137     if (!vlnv.getVendor().isEmpty())
00138     {
00139         dir += "/" + vlnv.getVendor();
00140 
00141         if (!vlnv.getLibrary().isEmpty())
00142         {
00143             dir += "/" + vlnv.getLibrary();
00144 
00145             if (!vlnv.getName().isEmpty())
00146             {
00147                 dir += "/" + vlnv.getName();
00148 
00149                 if (!vlnv.getVersion().isEmpty())
00150                 {
00151                     dir += "/" + vlnv.getVersion();
00152                 }
00153             }
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00157     directoryEdit_.setText(dir);
00158 }
